version_description:
-Added the "Update" button to Home screen
-Improve stability

-You can use the copy and paste function when you enter your login password.
-Improve stability

-Icon will be displayed next to stores that are eligible for mileage campaign.
-Improve stability

-SKiP service for domestic flights, ANA Lounges, and the self-service check-in machines can be used by presenting the QR code on the digital membership card screen.
-A new category will be added in ANA STORE: Movies and Games.
-Improve stability.

-Members who registered for SKiP Service with iPhone7/7Plus and received error message have been fixed.
-Improve stability

App can not be startup on iOS8.
We are revising that now.
Please do not update until the renovation ends.

-We fixed the defect in which app can not be startup on iOS8.
-Improve stability.
-New function added to the application such as reservation of award tickets.

-"ANA Mileage Club 20th anniversary" button was added from the menu button.
-Improve stability.

-Added the function to send a message (ex.When you have attained Premium Service status or Million Miler . Your birthday)
-Improve stability

-View “application-specific information” with one tap from HOME screen.
-When there is new arrival of information, a round button glows.
-Review Member Service and App Setting.
-Supported iPhoneX.
-Improve stability.

-On the MILEAGE and ANA SKY COIN screen, we made a minor modification of the expiration date graph.
-Improve stability.

-We have set up a function that can set your required mileage to the target.
"How many miles to goal is achieved" can be checked with numbers and graphs, so you can save miles with fun.
-Improve stability.

- Added Retroactive Mileage Registration button in the TOP screen upper right button.

-Added "coupon for ANA Express Bus Ticket" button.
Tickets will only be displayed to the target from the end of March.

- Location information is availab

- ANA STORE Renewal

At the top of the screen, a new search box can be found for products and stores.
In addition, the ANA Recommended area has been enhanced, and you can feel free to view recommended products such as ANA original goods.

- Added favorite function to ANA STORE.

It is now possible to register frequently used shops as favorites and display them in a list.
*Japanese, Japan resident only

- Improve stability

ANA Sky Gatcha!mall on the ANA SKY COIN screen Installed the mall icon.
So,you can access to the ANA Sky Getcha!mall directly.

-A new feature “ANA Pay” (QR code payment service) has been added.
-Improve stability
